CustomField.description: This field is used to displayÂ an image on the record page layout under the email address based on whether or not the HasBounced__c field has a certain value.
CustomField.formula: IF(HasBounced__c = TRUE, "This Email needs to be Updated", NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The red message indicates we've tried to email this user and received a bounce-back on the email. Please check the email address and update it.
CustomField.label: Email Status
